Class Crack

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Sprite
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Crack
public class Crack extends Sprite
A Sprite class, appears in red and green bricks when the brick is hit by a ball.
Author:
Tianxiang Song
